title: Top 10 lip shades you should try rn!
text:
View this post on Instagram A post shared by disha patani (paatni) (@dishapatani) on Apr 3, 2019 at 9:33am PDT

The National Lipstick Day is here and here’s the low-down on what’s new in the cosmetic case:~ While the last few years saw a trendy tiff between team gloss and team matte, 2019 called a truce with creamy lipsticks. They keep the lips nourished for long, aren’t too shiny for the day light and offer a sultry, almost-matte finesse.~ For all of you who have been stocking your wardrobes with baby pinks, dusty yellows, sky blues and dim crimsons, it should come as a relief that the pastel power has taken to the makeup bag too. Soft hued, subtle shades of lipsticks are making rounds as no-makeup makeup look and monotone magic becomes the new obsession.~The love for au naturel pink pout gives lip tints its fair share of attention. Its effortless application, safe-not-sorry attitude, and even lightening nature has made it a constant in most beauty bags.~Ombré is the coolest kid in the block. While a soft play of liner with a darker filling is gaining momentum, ombré lipsticks are entering the market for a seamless fusion.Now that you are all caught up with what’s new and on-trend, here’s a quick look book to refresh your memory on the hottest shades of the season:Disha Patani
description: Hottes lip shades by Disha Patani, Naomi Scott, Sonakshi Sinha, Priyanka Chopra Jonas, Lady Gaga, Bhumi Pednekar, Kylie Jenner, Esha Gupta and Maisie Williams.
